ingredients.ingredient: 1 medium sweet potato, peeled and sliced crossways into 1/8-inch slices

cookingTips: Slice sweet potatoes evenly at 1/8-inch thickness for uniform cooking
Toss chips with oil before air frying to ensure even browning
Check chips halfway through cooking and shake basket for crispness
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How can you ensure your sweet potato chips are crispy rather than chewy in the air fryer?
